description: Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.
Equip: Your Mortal Strike has a 25% chance to apply the Colossus Smash effect to your target for 6 sec.
Equip: Replaces Templar's Verdict with Final Verdict, a devastating strike that deals 6,619 Holy damage. Has a 15% chance to activate Hammer of Wrath and reset its cooldown.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.
Equip: When Moonfire, Rake, Rip, or Rejuvenation are active on a single target, their effects are increased 40%.
Equip: Feign Death cooldown reduced by 15.0 sec, and Feign Death now removes most negative status effects from yourself.
Equip: Replaces Templar's Verdict with Final Verdict, a devastating strike that deals 6,204 Holy damage. Has a 15% chance to activate Hammer of Wrath and reset its cooldown.

Equip: Enter a pact with the Death Loa, calling forth a haunted mask that lingers on a target until Fae Guardians ends.

Haunted Mask: Copies the benefit of the current faerie on its target. Follows your Direct Mask.

Equip: Casting Unholy Nova summons a Rattling Mage that gains 2% additional damage and healing each time an enemy affected by Unholy Transfusion is damaged by an ally, up to 100%.

The Rattling Mage serves you for 20 sec, blasting your target for 1,032 Shadow damage.
Equip: Earth Elemental has a permanent Earthquake attached to it.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.

Equip: Each consecutive critical strike you deal increases critical strike damage you deal by 3%, up to 15%.
Equip: Earth Shield healing is increased by 150% if your Earth Shield target is below 75% health, and Healing Wave adds a stack of Earth Shield to your target, up to 9 maximum stacks.

Equip: Casting any Barrier spell grants the effects of Blazing Barrier, Ice Barrier, and Prismatic Barrier. Each absorb shield has 65% effectiveness.
